metadata.Title: CVE-2020-35508 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.Description: A flaw possibility of race condition and incorrect initialization of theprocess id was found in the Linux kernel child/parent processidentification handling while filtering signal handlers. A local attackeris able to abuse this flaw to bypass checks to send any signal to aprivileged process.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
